lead_paragraph: ZUCKERMAN--George R.,of Westwood, MA, formerly of Brightwaters, NY, died on January 10, 2015, after a brief illness. He is survived by his devoted wife Marjorie (nee Wohl) and his beloved children, daughter Marcia Zuckerman, son Steven Zuckerman, and daughter-in-law Debra Meyerson. He also leaves adored grandchildren Daniel, Adam, and Sarah. Contributions in his memory may be made to Compassion and Choices, Southern Poverty Law Center, or a charity of your choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ZUCKERMAN, GEORGE R.
